references: R. K. Guy, Unsolved Problems in Number Theory, D3.
links: S. P. Mohanty, Which triangular numbers are products of three consecutive integers?, Acta Mathematica Hungarica 1991, Volume 58, Issue 1-2, pp 31-36.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Triangular Number.
maple: count:= 0:for a from 0 to 637 do  p:= a*(a+1)*(a+2);  if issqr(1+8*p) then    count:= count+1;    A[count]:= p;  fiod:seq(A[i],i=1..count); # _Robert Israel_, Jan 14 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
